name: Thunderbird Dark
description:
Dark theme for Thunderbird's main UI. To get the result on the screenshot, also install my styles "Developer Edition Dark" and "about:pages Dark"!

If you have any issues with this style, please open a ticket at https://github.com/NiklasGollenstede/stylish
additional_info:
Update 2017-08-21:
Fix window buttons, see #13.
The inversion of the mail content in the composer window can be toggled by moving the window to the top of the screen.

Update 2017-04-07:
Fix some white backgrounds on MacOS, see #11.

Update 2017-03-13:
Exclude message compose content frame to be compatible with "about:pages Dark".
